Meteara turns back to Talos.

Meteara: So, Talos, have you thought about what I said? What do you 
say?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis/Horn::
>        He nods and smiles inwardly at himself.  His obedience had 
startled 
> her, this was a good sign.  He stands at attention and slams his 
right hand 
> against the left side of his chest, this serves the double purpose 
of a 
> solute and implanting the chip for reading.  With that he spins on 
his heel 
> and heads toward the coordinates.
> 
>        He leans over and whispers to Horn. "Begin work on that 
surveillance 
> device.  I want to transmit to her any signs of intelligent life 
that comes 
> within two miles of these coordinates."
